metadata.title: CVE-2024-26664 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: hwmon:(coretemp) Fix out-of-bounds memory access Fix a bug that pdata->cpu_map[]is set before out-of-bounds check. The problem might be triggered onsystems with more than 128 cores per package.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
